markdownRemark.html:
Overview

In the Choerodon UI, you can use Attachment, Upload<basic>, Upload<pro>. There are differences in the use of the three, and the appropriate selection of corresponding components for development according to requirements and scenarios will double the effort with half the effort.

Attachment The project is standardized and the global configuration is perfect, and developers can use it directly, with comprehensive scenarios and high efficiency.

Upload is more suitable for personalized upload processing and more flexible application scenarios.

Component description

Attachment

Attachment - Choerodon UI 1.4.4 version has been added to support the upload and display of attachments.

Presentation form

Basic form

Attachment Rendering consists of two main parts:

1、Upload the action area

2、Attachment list area

The click and drag upload functions of Upload are:

1、Button

2、Drag box pattern

A variety of attachment list display forms

1、Directly display the list of attachments

2、Display the list of attachments by drop-down

3、listType sets the list presentation style

a. text

b. picture

c. pciture-card

4、In addition, it also supports group display, embedded use in table forms, etc.

How to use it

Global configuration is supported

You can manage the callback processing of upload services, addresses, and upload stages through global configuration, making management more centralized and efficient。ViewFull configuration。

configure({
  attachment: {
    defaultFileKey: 'file',
    defaultFileSize: 500 * 1024 * 1024,
    defaultChunkSize: 5 * 1024 * 1024,
    defaultChunkThreads: 3,
    action: {
      url: 'https://www.mocky.io/v2/5cc8019d300000980a055e76',
      headers: {
        'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*',
      },
    },
    fetchList({ attachmentUUID }) {
      return Axios.get(`/attachment/${attachmentUUID}`).then((response) => {
        return response.map((file) => ({
          uid: file.fileId,
          name: file.fileName,
          size: file.fileSize,
          type: file.fileType,
          url: file.fileUrl,
          creationDate: moment(file.creationDate).toDate(),
          status: 'done',
        }));
      });
    },
    fetchFileSize: () => Promise.resolve(500 * 1024 * 1024),
    batchFetchCount(uuids) {
      return Axios.get(`/attachment-count/${uuids.sort().join(',')}`);
    },
    onRemove() {
      return new Promise((resolve) =>
        setTimeout(() => resolve(Math.random() >= 0.1), 1000),
      );
    },
    onOrderChange() {
      return Promise.resolve();
    },
    ···
});

It's easier to use

Since most of the functionality is already handled in the project's global configuration, components are easier to use.

const props = {
  label: '技术附件',
  labelLayout: 'float',
  accept: ['.deb', '.txt', '.pdf', 'image/*'],
  max: 9,
  value,
  onChange: setValue,
  showHistory: true,
  useChunk: true,
  chunkSize: 1024,
  help: '支持文件类型： .deb .txt .pdf image/*',
};

<Attachment {...props} />

Support for association DataSet

Compared to Upload, the way to associate DataSet is used.

const ds = new DataSet({
  fields: [
    {
      name: 'attachment',
      type: 'attachment',
      label: <span>技术附件</span>,
      max: 9,
      required: true,
      template: {
        attachmentUUID: '4c74a34a-fa37-4e92-be9d-5cf726fb1472',
      },
    },
  ],
});

<Attachment dataSet={ds} name="attachment" />

Attachment management is more delicate

1、Support attachment list sorting (time / name)

2、Supports drag-and-drop sorting

3、Support for managing historical operation records

4、File removal, preview, download, and other functions are fully supported

The UI interface is highly configurable

1、Action button configuration

2、Upload form configuration

3、List display style configuration, etc

Upload

Presentation form

The Upload component will be better overall basic in form, but Attachment will be better in comparison.

Basic form

The upload component basic is more flexible and rich than the pro basic form.

pro

basic

Document presentation form

basic display mode for files is relatively richer and more beautiful.

pro

basic

Support the listType attribute to display the file as text, picture, picture-card.

How to use it

Upload is more independent and flexible than attachment.

Basic functionality

Support click upload

You can display uploaded lists

a. basic - defaultFileList

b. pro - uploadFileList

Control the upload list

a. accept - Controls file types

b. beforeupload - Get the file information for inspection

Show additional information about the file

Customize the response handling method

a. Upload successful callback

b. Upload failure callback

Difference

The upload callback and rendering interaction are different from the basic Upload component, so pay attention to choose and use them according to your needs. Like what:

Upload behavior

1、pro - uploadImmediately The property supports whether to upload immediately

2、basic - By default, upload immediately, you can set up manual upload

3、pro Upload Drag-and-drop upload is not supported

Callback functions

1、onSuccess（basic）

2、onError（basic）

3、onUploadSuccess（pro）

4、onUploadError（pro）

basic more callback functions are supported

1、onReUpload

2、onDragEnd
